Package bcompetition.Model

Class CompetitorList

java.lang.Object
bcompetition.Model.CompetitorList
public class CompetitorList extends Object
The CompetitorList class represents a list of competitors in a competition. It provides various methods for managing and analyzing the competitor data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CompetitorList(String fileName)
    Constructs a CompetitorList object with the specified file name and reads competitor data from the file.

  • Method Details

    • highestOverallScore

      public String highestOverallScore()
      Finds and returns the participant with the highest overall score.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the participant with the highest overall score.

    • removeBoxer

      public String removeBoxer(int id)
      Removes a boxer with the specified ID from the list of participants.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the boxer to be removed.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the success or failure of the removal.

    • viewDetailsCategory

      public String viewDetailsCategory(Category category)
      Returns a string representation of participants in a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of participants to view.
      Returns:
      A string representation of participants in the specified category.

    • getAllParticipants

      public ArrayList<KABoxer> getAllParticipants()
      Returns the list of all participants in the competition.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all participants.

    • alterBoxerScores

      public String alterBoxerScores(int id, int[] score)
      Updates the scores of a boxer with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the boxer.
      score - An array of scores to update.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the updated boxer details.

    • boxerTable

      public String boxerTable()
      Generates a formatted string representation of a table containing details for each KABoxer. The table includes information such as full details, total, maximum score, minimum score, frequency of score elements, and average score.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the boxer table.

    • getCompetitorShortDetails

      public String getCompetitorShortDetails(int id)
      Retrieves the short details of a boxer based on the provided competitor ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The competitor ID to search for.
      Returns:
      The short details of the boxer if found, or "Boxer doesn't exist" otherwise.

    • boxerExists

      public boolean boxerExists(int id)
      Checks if a boxer with the specified competitor ID exists.
      Parameters:
      id - The competitor ID to check.
      Returns:
      True if a boxer with the given ID exists, false otherwise.

    • getCompetitorFullDetails

      public String getCompetitorFullDetails(int id)
      Retrieves the full details of a boxer based on the provided competitor ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The competitor ID to search for.
      Returns:
      The full details of the boxer if found, or "Boxer doesn't exist" otherwise.

    • editBoxerDetails

      public String editBoxerDetails(int id, String detail, String input)
      Edits details of a boxer identified by their competitor ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The competitor ID of the boxer to be edited.
      detail - The detail to be edited (e.g., Name, Middle Name, Age).
      input - The new value to be set for the specified detail.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the outcome of the edit operation or an error message.

    • calcTotals

      public int calcTotals(KABoxer boxer)
      Calculates the sum of scores for a given boxer.
      Parameters:
      boxer - The boxer for whom the scores are calculated.
      Returns:
      The total sum of scores.

    • calcAverages

      public double calcAverages(KABoxer boxer)
      Calculates the average of scores for a given boxer.
      Parameters:
      boxer - The boxer for whom the average is calculated.
      Returns:
      The average of scores as a double.

    • calcMax

      public int calcMax(KABoxer boxer)
      Finds the maximum score among a boxer's scores.
      Parameters:
      boxer - The boxer for whom the maximum score is found.
      Returns:
      The maximum score.

      public int calcMin(KABoxer boxer)

      boxer - The boxer for whom the minimum score is found.

    • calcFrequency

      public String calcFrequency(KABoxer boxer)
      Calculates the frequency of each score in a boxer's array.
      Parameters:
      boxer - The boxer for whom the frequency is calculated.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the frequency of each score.

    • writeToFile

      public void writeToFile(String fileName)
      Writes the competitor data to a specified file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to write the data to.

    • readAllParticipants

      public void readAllParticipants(String fileName)
      Reads competitor data from a file and populates the list of participants.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to read data from.

    • setDetailsForPerson

      public ArrayList<String> setDetailsForPerson(String value)
      Parses the input string to extract details for a person, including first name, middle name, and last name.The input string should contain space-separated elements. If a middle name is not present, an empty string is assigned.
      Parameters:
      value - The input string containing details for a person.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the parsed details: [firstName, middleName, lastName].

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the list of KABoxer objects in this instance. The string is generated by concatenating the string representations of each KABoxer in the list.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the list of KABoxer objects.
